definition: A state of moral corruption or wickedness.
Overly forward or confident in a way that is rude; taking freedoms without permission.
Impressive or magnificent in appearance or in effect, often in an exaggerated or pretentious way.
To scatter or spread widely (especially information or ideas).
Selecting or composed of elements drawn from various sources.
Excessively obedient or submissive; like a servant.
Having a huge appetite (for food or metaphorically, for knowledge, etc.).
Extremely complicated and difficult to follow.
To speak or shout at length in an angry, impassioned way.
A clever plan or scheme, especially one used to outwit someone.
